wiki.content: "Best Song Ever" is a dance pop/power pop song recorded by the British-Irish boy band One Direction. It was released on 22 July 2013 by Syco and Columbia. The opening of the song incorporates the power chords used by The Who's "Baba O'Riley", played by guitarist Pete Townshend (who praised 1D's track). The song became available for pre-order on iTunes on 26 June. After being leaked, the song's audio was uploaded to VEVO on 19 July. The music video was officially released on 22 July. The music video also broke the VEVO record for having the most views in a 24-hour period with 12.3 million, beating Miley Cyrus' "We Can't Stop" which recorded 10.7 million. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Best Song Ever" is a dance pop/power pop song recorded by the British-Irish boy band One Direction. It was released on 22 July 2013 by Syco and Columbia. The opening of the song incorporates the power chords used by The Who's "Baba O'Riley", played by guitarist Pete Townshend (who praised 1D's track). The song became available for pre-order on iTunes on 26 June. After being leaked, the song's audio was uploaded to VEVO on 19 July. The music video was officially released on 22 July. The music video also broke the VEVO record for having the most views in a 24-hour period with 12.

track.name: Best Song Ever
comments:
This is such a (AHEM) GOOD song! Actually, it's amazing. I love One Direction and I'm really proud of all of them.
Also, just because the into sounds like that song by the Who doesn't mean that they copied them - and the words and tune of the actual song are completely different so- No need to freak out!
Actually this is the worst song ever [12]
Haters to the left. Even Pete Townshend loves it.
I dont like this boyband but this song is really good :) [4]
Biggest exaggeration ever.
I dont like this boyband but this song is really good :) [3]
Whatever everybody say, I Love This song! [3]
Actually this is the worst song ever [12]
So catchy it's almost annoying ay ay

I'll take the moral high road and just take the blatant ripoff, as it were, as a compliment to the awesomeness of the masterpiece in question and how relevant and fresh it still is. At best, maybe some of these vacuous airheads may check out where it originated and get a taste for real music. Everybody's gotta grow up sometime.
It's not meant to be the best song ever. Only Directioners would know the meaning of the song.
I dont like this boyband but this song is really good :) [2]
nah its fun :3
Actually this is the worst song ever [11]
Whatever everybody say, I Love This song! [2]
Best Song Ever is THE BEST SONG EVER! ♥ [21]
Guilty pleasure.
I dont like this boyband but this song is really good :)
